channel.title: Cant compile anyones server
channel.description:
when i open the folder and click compile it says
"cannot find the path specified" "cannot find the path specified" "press any key to continue"

item.title: Cant compile anyones server
item.dc:creator: @drgn24b drgn24b
item.description:
@drgn24b wrote:

its because it cant find the file, they might have

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_13\bin\java.exe"

and you need to change it to

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe"

to do this, right click it and click on edit

Read full topic

item.title: Cant compile anyones server
item.dc:creator: @kestral kestral
item.description:
@kestral wrote:

simple fix
right click compile.bat and click “edit”. Then erase everything in it and put this in it’s place:

@echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Ok now save it and right click runserver.bat and erase all of that and add this:

@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Ok now we have a working source!

!!!VERY IMPORTANT!!!

Make sure you have downloaded Java SDK 1.6

Taken From Mod Taharok’s Ultimate Server Guide

Read full topic
